about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in Backspace Backspace Backspace, a narrative-driven game that explores the inner turmoil of a struggling writer in an age where AI has made the written word wholly automated.

Game Features:

  • Narrative-focused visual novella putting the player in the shoes of a tortured creative soul.

  • Homemade pixel art direction reminiscent of the GBA era.

  • Full soundtrack of chiptune-style music.

  • Meaningful choices.

  • Dialogue available in eight languages (so far!): English, Arabic, Turkish, French, Chinese (traditional & simplified), Korean, Russian, and Vietnamese! Get in touch if you can help localize the game in other languages.

  • Two endings. Try to get both!

We made this game in one week. Debugging and further touch-ups took two months. We never created pixel art or original music before, but we used this project as an opportunity to push ourselves outside our comfort zone and grow more independent as a team of two. Above all else, Backspace Backspace Backspace is our love letter to every creative soul out there. Keep making!

Because we appreciate transparency, and to help you save your money, here's what this game is not:

  • A "long" game. We made this game with compactness in mind. Expect no more than 20 minutes of gameplay.

  • A flawless game. Backspace Backspace Backspace is a small project made in a limited time frame, with limited experience, and virtually no resources, with the intent of learning how to make a game from scratch. Naturally, it will have technical issues. We are still working on them, but we don't want this game to hold us back from focusing on our next project. If you encounter a bug, please let us know.

We have many more games lined up in the near future. If you already purchased Backspace Backspace Backspace and would like to support us further, we would be immensely grateful to you. Leave us a review, tell your friends about this game, or purchase the Backspace Backspace Backspace soundtrack (which is also available on YouTube for free).

content_descriptors.notes: While nothing in this game is explicitly for mature audiences only, BACKSPACE BACKSPACE BACKSPACE depicts a bleak and depressing reality that we do not think is appropriate for children, whose lives should be filled with hope. Aside from minor distorted visuals and disturbing music, the aforementioned depiction was done without swear words, violence (stark or implied), or adult-only content of any kind.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra) or later
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or faster (Any dual-core Intel processor)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (such as Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Backspace Backspace Backspace

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (Windows 8, 10, and 11 will also work)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or faster (Any dual-core CPU should suffice)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (such as Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In an AI-powered age where original authors have become largely redundant, play as a dejected writer on the brink of losing their creative drive forever.
supported_languages: English, Arabic, French, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese
